title: Try it yourself
body:
The table below contains data about spending in the Ministry of Magic in 2014. As you can see, even those with magic powers cannot keep their data clean!

The table is editable, see how many errors you can spot and fix and then press submit to receive personalised feedback from the AI assistant tutor.

DEMO LIMITATIONS: You can only submit once; it is not possible in this version to edit your answer to try again.
instruction: When you are happy you have cleaned the data, press submit.
systemAI:

chatTemplate: The users answer to the question is: {{userAnswer}} Give the user some constructive feedback on their answer, rewarding them where they have made good changes. Use the model answer to point out any additional things, if there are any.

title: Can you clean the data?
body:
In the task that follows you will find a table containing data relating to Ministry of Magic spending over £25000 for the year 2014. This task has been designed for you to apply your skills in cleaning a dataset.

This task requires you to:

  • Reorganise and restructure a messy dataset that can be analysed simply by both human and machine
  • The dataset should contain enough data to enable analysis of the data by entity, date, type, supplier and cost.

title: Graphic for Can you clean the data?
How you will receive feedback
body:
The Assistant AI Tutor uses AI that we have specifically trained to deal with this task. It has been given an example, model answer and some other marking criteria. The assistant tutor will look to mark against a number of criteria including:

  1. How the data is structured
  2. The consistency of the data in each row/column
  3. The cleanliness of the data

IMPORTANT: We do not expect the Assistant AI Tutor to be 100% reliable and accurate. We have applied it here in order to examine the ability for AI to give instant feedback rather than wait for a human tutor to be available. We believe there is some value in doing this, but also recognise the need for a human to be 'in-the-loop'. For this reason we have built in checks and processes that allow a human tutor to override the Assistant AI Tutor. 

The ultimate goal is to leverage AI's potential to create transformative, personalised, and inclusive learning experiences while ensuring ethical and responsible use. To that end, we will ask you for feedback about your experiences with the Assistant AI Tutor in order for us to carry out preliminary evaluations.

title: Thank-you!
body:
We hope you have enjoyed this short learning experience. As well as sharing a sample of our learning content with you, we have also used this opportunity to provide you with the opportunity to experience the AI Assistant Tutor (powered by ChatGPT) to generate formative feedback.

You can learn more about data cleaning on our newly revamped Strategic Data Skills course

title: Introduction
body:
The ODI is embarking on a pilot project that integrates Generative AI into our learning content development and assessment, aiming to enhance the learner experience by providing instant and effective feedback on formative learning activities. 

This learning activity provides an opportunity for you to engage with the Assistant AI Tutor and experience the personalised feedback it generates.

_graphic.attribution: The Open Data Institute [All rights reserved]

title: How did you find your experience?
displayTitle: How did you find your experience?
body:
At ODI, we aim to explore how responsible Generative AI (Artificial Intelligence) can improve the learning experience in formative assessments. We are excited to have received funding from UKRI for SAGE-RAI (Smart Assessment and Guided Education with Responsible AI) - which will work with educational GenAI tools, including the AI Digital Assistant, to explore how the use of responsible GenAI may lead to improved student achievements. 

A Request for Feedback: We are looking for input from learners like you to support our project. Your feedback is essential in shaping the responsible use of AI in education. Please consider completing the short survey below (no more than 3 mins of your time), to provide feedback on your learning experience, and your exposure to the Assistant AI Tutor. Your input will help us create a tool that benefits both learners and educators.

Why Your Feedback Matters: We want to ensure that our Assistant AI Tutor enhances your educational experience and acts as an effective tool to provide effective personalised learning. However, in our investigations we are committed to identifying consequences, as well as addressing potential challenges and uncertainties. Your insights will help us refine our approach and understand how Generative AI can be used as a valuable tool for learning.
